items.name: Skyview PoS Lounge
items.short_description: Experience breathtaking panoramic views of the city skyline and Gulf of Paria while enjoying artisanal cocktails and local bites in this chic rooftop setting. Perfect for sunset gatherings.
items.address: Level 10, 10 Wrightson Road, Port of Spain

items.name: The Gallery @ Keate
items.short_description: A dynamic contemporary art space showcasing emerging Trinidadian artists and international exhibits. Features interactive installations and regular artist talks.

items.name: Pan Rhapsody Centre
items.short_description: Dive into the history and evolution of the steelpan, Trinidad and Tobago's national instrument. Interactive displays, live demonstrations, and opportunities to try playing.
items.address: 20 Queen's Park East, Port of Spain

items.name: Savannah Eats Market
items.short_description: A vibrant indoor market featuring diverse local and international cuisine vendors, artisanal food products, and regular cooking demonstrations. A culinary hub for foodies.

items.name: St. Clair Eco-Gardens
items.short_description: A serene urban oasis created from a once-neglected plot, offering walking trails, meditation zones, and native plant exhibitions. Perfect for a peaceful escape in the city.
items.address: Corner of Alexandra Street and St. Clair Avenue, Port of Spain

items.name: The Nexus Innovation Hub
items.short_description: A vibrant space fostering creativity and collaboration, offering co-working options, tech workshops, and a regular schedule of public innovation talks and startup pitch events.

items.name: The Sapphire Screen & Stage
items.short_description: A sophisticated venue offering an intimate cinematic experience with independent films, along with live local performances from spoken word to acoustic sets. Features a full-service bar.

items.name: Portside Promenade
items.short_description: A newly revitalized stretch along the waterfront, perfect for leisurely strolls, cycling, and enjoying sea breezes. Features public art installations and pop-up food vendors on weekends.
items.address: Western Main Road, Cocorite (near Audrey Jeffers Highway junction), Port of Spain

items.name: Caribbean Craft Brews
items.short_description: Discover the art of local craft beer brewing with guided tours, tasting flights, and a lively taproom. Learn about unique Caribbean-inspired flavours and brewing techniques.

items.name: HyperPlay VR Arena
items.short_description: Step into immersive virtual reality worlds and state-of-the-art gaming stations. Offering a range of experiences from competitive multiplayer VR to casual arcade fun for all ages.
items.address: Level 2, The Falls at West Mall, Westmoorings, Port of Spain
